message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI

This paper deals with natural language processing and information retrieval techniques for summarizing multiple documents describing evolving events. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The use of cross-document relations and graph-based approaches suggests cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as a possible sub-category. The evaluation of the methodology in case studies involving football matches and terrorist incidents suggests cs.LG (Learning) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as additional possible sub-categories.
